channel.title: [508] Help with our playercombat
channel.description:
Not revealing too much but were currently working on a simple but effective 508 pvp server, but currently when we try to fight this exception occurs in the run.cmd "this happens when one player attacks another"
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at PvpXtreme.rs2.players.combat.PlayerCombat.attackPl ayer(PlayerCombat.java:52) at PvpXtreme.rs2.players.Player.process(Player.java:1 510) at PvpXtreme.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:168) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
any help? this crashes the client and causes the two fighters to loose connection. if you don't know how to fix it, don't comment please. if you are willing to help and know what your talking about, please post all helpfull information.

item.title: [508] Help with our playercombat
item.dc:creator: @D3f14nc3 D3f14nc3
item.description:
@D3f14nc3 wrote:

Not revealing too much but were currently working on a simple but effective 508 pvp server, but currently when we try to fight this exception occurs in the run.cmd
“this happens when one player attacks another”

Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.NullPointerException
at PvpXtreme.rs2.players.combat.PlayerCombat.attackPl ayer(PlayerCombat.java:52)

any help?
this crashes the client and causes the two fighters to loose connection.
if you don’t know how to fix it, don’t comment please.
if you are willing to help and know what your talking about, please post all helpfull information.
